snippet: A report by the United Nations Environment Program says that greenhouse gas emissions must start to fall immediately to avoid more drastic and expensive action later.
abstract: Report released by the United Nations Environment Program cautions that major polluters must immediately begin to reduce greenhouse gas emissions if the rise in global temperatures is to be held in check to avoid drastic consequences later.
lead_paragraph: A report by the United Nations Environment Program says that greenhouse gas emissions must start to fall immediately to avoid more drastic and expensive action later.

headline.main: United Nations Group Warns on Emissions
headline.print_headline: U.N. Agency Urges Action In a Report On Emissions
